entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
